divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work. I got off the bus started to walk home and for some reason something was telling me to look up. As look up I notice something was hovering, in mid air, but I didn���t pay any mind to it. At first I thought it was plane, but it suddenly hit me that this object was hovering in mid air in a 45 degree angle in open area. I knew that it wasn���t an air plane because planes can���t hover in mid air and I knew it wasn���t a helicopter because the object was too big for it to be a helicopter. Like I said, the object was hovering in a 45 degree angle for a minute or two and then it slowly started to straighten itself out. Once it straightens itself out it began to proceed forward in a slow moving pace. I was actually blown away because I never expected to see something like this in my life. Anyway, the object continued moving forward until it was gone.
Summary: A strange object was hovering in mid air.
